page.title: 02A CHILD'S DAY WEST BATH
page.content: I am{10 years}old.On a Saturday I wake up at 6:30 and{read.}Then I get up and wash,dress and have breakfast (Shreddies).I load "HunchbackII"on my {computer-}a Commodore 64.After a few games I get on my{bike}and ride into town to go{swimming}at the sports centre.Afterwards I have lunch - beefburger,chips,ice cream and jelly.Then I take Cassie, my pet cocker spaniel, to the park.Then I have a game of{chess.}After that I {read }my book. Then I watch T.V.till its time for tea of scrambled egg.Afterwards I ride to the B.M.X track.After a while I ride home.Then I watch T.V.till 8:00 then I go to bed.
